displayName.english: Guess We'll Both be the Mommies

description.english: Get Brienne pregnant while you're already pregnant with her kid.

displayName.english: I'm A Lumberjack And I'm Okay

description.english: Rescue Garret from the logging camp.
Recover Sorra's Succor for Sanders and the chapel.
Put the spirits of Fort Marrok to rest.
Fight your way to the end of the Kurokawa kitsune den.
Restore peace to the vesperian hive.
Caused Arona to be exiled from the Kervus tribe.
Help Arona become the chieftain of the Kervus tribe.

displayName.english: The Brawl To End Them All

description.english: Win the bar fight in the orcish warcamp.
Corrupt the centaur village.
Purify the centaur village.

displayName.english: For What Profits It A Man

description.english: Trade in your soul to one of the gods for power and profit.

Defeat Nareva at her own game.
Change your name.
Help Leorah with her venom problem.
Keep the Cat Harem at your side after saving them from Hirrud Grune.
Buy a portable alchemy kit from Ivris.
Sell your soul to Keros for fluffy tail.
Purchase a special deal from Kohaku.
As a kitsune, equip the swift sword, fluffy scarf, kabuto and lamellar armor all at once.
Discover Pupperidge Farms.
Marry Atani, chieftain of the marefolk.
Let Hashat show you a good time as an elf.
Help Shar move into the ruined tower.

Build the Temple of Mallach for Cait.
Your daughter survived an attempt on her life.
Help Etheryn put her ancestors to rest.

displayName.english: There Is No Chaos, There Is Harmony

description.english: Acquire the Pure Dawnsword.

displayName.english: Is It Possible To Learn This Power

description.english: Offer your services at the Temple of Mallach for a high price.

displayName.english: A Form You Are Comfortable With

description.english: Discover River's true identity.

Sire a child with each possible member of the Kervus tribe simultaneously.
Conquer the Temple of Terrestrial Fire.
Discover Hawkethorne's sordid past.

Visit Serena's class in Khor'minos.
Visit the Milking Barn in Khor'minos.
Resolve the centaur troupe's living situation.
Visit Brint/Brienne's childhood home.

displayName.english: There's Gold Under Them There Mountains

description.english: Have an audience with the kobold queen beneath the Undermountain.
Complete the Feast For Heroes.
Complete The Siege of Khor'minos.
Win the Battle of Khor'torhen Fortress without losing any units.
Keep Kasyrra's identity a secret from the city at the end of Act 2.
Grab Princess Varena's chest during the Feast For Heroes.
Activate Varena's dominant streak.
Become the champion of the Khor'minoan Arena.
Complete the Demon of Ice.
Free Princess Etheryn from her cursed cage.
Uncover the secrets of the Bath House with Varena.
Lay waste to the Corrupted Lupine den.

Get engaged to Hana.
Convince the Kervus Tribe to put down roots on the Coastlands at King Kelsaz's invitation.

displayName.english: Home is Where the Heart Is

description.english: Either bed Arona and Ylvid together, or convince Arona and Ylvid to have children together.

Transform yourself into a dragon.

Equip one power from each class simultaneously.

Gorge yourself on golden apples in the secluded orchard.
